title: Seeking It Always (1U275)
text:
Set:	The Fellowship of the Ring
Kind:	Shadow
Culture:	Sauron
Twilight:	1
Card Type:	Condition
Game Text:	Search. Plays to your support area. Response: If a stealth event is played, exert a [Sauron] tracker to cancel that event.
Lore:	”'…the only measure that he knows is desire, desire for power; and so he judges all hearts.'”
Rarity:	U
